title: 1916년 Carstens 사건
summary: 미국 California, CA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Carstens. 판결일: 1916-05-22. 법원: California Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: H. F. CARSTENS, Petitioner, v. A. J. PILLSBURY Et Al., Composing the Industrial Accident Commission of the State of California, Respondents
**판결일**: 1916-05-22
**법원**: California Supreme Court
**관할**: California, CA

**판사**: Angellotti, Shaw

## 변호인

Driver & Driver, for Petitioner., Christopher M. Bradley, for Respondents.

## 인용

- 158 P. 218
- 172 Cal. 572

## 판결문 요약

Without expressing any view on the other questions involved, I concur in the judgment on the last ground stated in the opinion.
Lawlor, J., dissented....
